import React, { Component } from 'react' import ProductService from '../../../service/product.service' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' class EditProductForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { name: '', price: '', category: '', imgURL: '' } this.productService = new ProductService() } handleInputChange = e => { const {name, value} = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() this.productService.updateProduct(this.state) .then( () => this.props.hideModalWindow) .catch(err => console.log) } render() { return (

Edit Product

Name Price Category URL-image {/* */}
) } } export default EditProductForm
